name: SlopeViews
overview:
SlopeViews provides complete immersive video production services. From concept development to final dissemination, the company works closely with clients to create a custom 360Â° video experience. SlopeViews also integrates 360Â° immersive videos into trail maps, village maps, or building floorplans.

Concept Development - The unique nature of spherical video requires innovative thinking and fresh ideas for each project. During concept development, they work to develop a unique approach to 360Â° video.

Custom Collection - The camera crews can operate over any terrain on foot, on skis, or from any type of vehicle. They will implement a plan to capture exactly what is needed to create a project that will deliver.

Post Production â€“ In the studio, they will write a custom stitching script that will ensure the video is seamless, then process the eleven video streams into a single hi-resolution file that is edited and manipulated to suit the clients need.

Editing â€“ This is where they will cut, make adjustments for color and light, and insert additional audio or visual effects to create the conceptualized immersive video.

Dissemination - They will integrate the immersive application into any website. This includes installation of the Flash Player, ensuring existing server support, libraries, extensions, and testing. Web hosting and web streaming are available, as well as CD, DVD or hard drive distribution.

The services can help empower the client’s customers and engage new visitors with rich, interactive 3D video. The company helps strengthen web presence and enhance advertising with location-based services, floating video ads, and the integration of meta-data with augmented reality into the video.
